org.cornutum.tcases.io

Class SystemInputDocWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cornutum.tcases.io.AbstractSystemInputWriter
      • org.cornutum.tcases.io.SystemInputDocWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class SystemInputDocWriter
extends AbstractSystemInputWriter
    Writes a SystemInputDef in the form of an XML document.
